name: docker-optimization
description: Example project showing how to optimize Dockerfile to reduce the final docker image size

scripts.build:docker:v1: /usr/bin/time --format='----- Build duration: %e seconds -----' docker build --no-cache --force-rm --tag docker-optimization-v1 --file ./build-params/v1/Dockerfile .
scripts.build:docker:v2: /usr/bin/time --format='----- Build duration: %e seconds -----' docker build --no-cache --force-rm --tag docker-optimization-v2 --file ./build-params/v2/Dockerfile .
scripts.build:docker:v3: /usr/bin/time --format='----- Build duration: %e seconds -----' docker build --no-cache --force-rm --tag docker-optimization-v3 --file ./build-params/v3/Dockerfile .
scripts.build:docker:v4: /usr/bin/time --format='----- Build duration: %e seconds -----' docker build --no-cache --force-rm --tag docker-optimization-v4 --file ./build-params/v4/Dockerfile .
scripts.build:docker:v5: /usr/bin/time --format='----- Build duration: %e seconds -----' docker build --no-cache --force-rm --tag docker-optimization-v5 --file ./build-params/v5/Dockerfile .
scripts.build:docker:all: npm run build:docker:v1 && npm run build:docker:v2 && npm run build:docker:v3 && npm run build:docker:v4 && npm run build:docker:v5
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src -e ts --exec 'ts-node --project tsconfig.json src/index.ts'
